title: thanks riot
body:
thanks riot, cant play league anymore due to the new ui update

The way you colored it puts extreme strain on peoples eyes, played a 20 minute game and got a massive migraine. 

havn't you guys ever heard of, if it aint broke dont fix it?

replies.body:
They fixed the issues people had with the old HUD, but created new problems.
and if everyone went by the saying "it aint broke don't fix it" we would be living in the fucking stone age
Ah the stone age, when cancer was yet to be born and we hadn't destroyed half of the planet and made ourselves happy at the same time.

Living in the stone age?
{{champion:48}} and {{champion:54}} approve
says you. the new ui is great if you ask me. i dont see how the ui can give you a migraine, but all the constant colours and animations happening on-screen in the game don't?
